name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts
recipeIngredient:
2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil or 
bacon fat

Kosher salt and freshly ground black 
pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 400. Trim the ends of the brussels sprouts, and remove all yellowing exterior leaves. Put the sprouts in a large bowl, and toss with the oil or bacon fat, and season well with salt and pepper.

Pour the sprouts onto a sheet pan and roast in the oven for 30 to 40 minutes, shaking the pan occasionally to brown the vegetables evenly, until crisp on the outside and tender within. Sprinkle a little more salt on them	and, if you like, red-pepper flakes.
